AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: noble child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family of some repute. [PAWN_pronoun] has known the taste of the silver spoon and is used to getting [PAWN_possessive] way, but [PAWN_possessive] status also brought the privilege of a quality education and the ability to lead with a commanding presence.
